item.title: Talk at GdR ISIS on October 6th
item.description: I will give a talk at the GdR ISIS meeting on October 6th at the UPMC (Paris). More info here, slides here and internship report here.
2016-2016, UPS1 CM TD TP L1 SNAF Algo 1 - - 42 L2 Info Logique 1 - - 12 L2 Info Système 1 - - 12 Université Toulouse 3 - Paul Sabatier ↩

item.title: Projects
item.description: Beside academic research, I also work on some development/hacking projects. TouIST (Toulouse Integrated Satisfiability Tool) Touist (see on github) is a Java and Ocaml project to provide a nice IDE as well as a high-level language for expressing and solving problems in propositional logic. This project was initiated during a school project in 2015 with three other school mates. Logistique de crise et aide humanitaire “Logistique de crise et aide humanitaire” is a research project completed during the M2 (2014-2015).
